attributes.action: Condemn the war in Yemen and fund hospitals & food banks for displaced citizens
attributes.additional_details:
20.1 million people in Yemen are food insecure.
19.7 million people are in need of basic healthcare.
It is the responsibility of this government to speak out against the violence that has dominated the region for years and actively work to help to protect those who are suffering from it as a result.
attributes.background: Condemn the war in Yemen that has left many people in short supply of food and medicine and commit to cooperating with other states and NGOs to help provide access to these basic civil liberties.
